title: question about ranked series
body:
im bronze v
made my way to 100 lp
it put me in a series 
i lose 1st game then won next 2 games
i thought i will be qualified 
i found my self in a new series 
something wrong ?

replies.body: It sounds strange that you'd have to do another series in this case, so I took a look into this.  It turns out that a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging)  occurred during your series, which counts as a loss.  As a result, your series ended but restarted with your next win.  I hope that helps clear things up, and best of luck in your current series!
